original_title: Bryan Ferry Concert at LSO St. Lukes London
overview: Series of unique, intimate performances by some of the greatest legends and contemporary stars around. Bryan Ferry is in concert at LSO St Luke's in Shoreditch, performing classic Roxy Music tunes plus solo tracks from his back catalogue, including Let's Stick Together, Avalon and More Than This. He also debuts tracks from his album of Bob Dylan covers, Dylanesque, his interpretation of songs such as Simple Twist of Fate, Positively 4th Street and Just Like Tom Thumb's Blues. The in-crowd  All along the watchtower  Slave to love To make me feel my love  Let´s stick together  Just like Tom thumb´s blues  Don´t stop the dance  Gates of eden  Smoke gets in your eyes  I put spell on you  A hard rain´s a gonna fall  Jealous Guy
title: Bryan Ferry Concert at LSO St. Lukes London
